mapper.select:
/** popup.selectPopupCnt */ SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_CNT FROM TB_FOR_POPUP WHERE IS_DEL = 'N'
AND POPUP_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchName}, '%')

/** popup.selectPopupList */ SELECT TP.LIST_NUM ,TP.POPUP_IDX ,TP.POPUP_TITLE ,TP.POPUP_START ,TP.POPUP_END ,TP.USER_NM ,TP.INSRT_DATE FROM (SELECT @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 AS LIST_NUM ,TP.POPUP_IDX ,TP.POPUP_TITLE ,TP.POPUP_START ,TP.POPUP_END ,TP.USER_NM ,TP.INSRT_DATE FROM TB_FOR_POPUP TP, (SELECT @rownum:=0) temp WHERE TP.IS_DEL = 'N' ORDER BY TP.POPUP_IDX DESC) TP LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}
/** popup.selectPopup */ SELECT POPUP_IDX ,POPUP_TITLE ,POPUP_CONTENT ,POPUP_START ,POPUP_END FROM TB_FOR_POPUP WHERE POPUP_IDX = #{popupIdx};
mapper.insert: /** popup.insertPopup */ INSERT INTO TB_FOR_POPUP ( POPUP_TITLE, POPUP_CONTENT, POPUP_START, POPUP_END, USER_NM, IS_DEL, INSRT_ID, INSRT_DATE, UPDT_ID, UPDT_DATE ) VALUE( #{popupTitle}, #{popupContent}, #{popupStart}, #{popupEnd}, #{userNm}, #{isDel}, #{insrtId}, NOW(), #{updtId}, NOW() )
mapper.update: /** popup.deletePopup */ UPDATE TB_FOR_POPUP SET IS_DEL = 'Y' WHERE POPUP_IDX = #{popupIdx}
